price: Lalle idan an fitar da su, bã zã su fita tãre da su ba kuma lalle idan an yãƙe su bã zã su taimake su ba, kuma lalle idan sun taimake su lalle ne, haƙĩƙatan, zã su jũyar da bãyansu dõmin gudu, sa'an nan kuma bã zã a taimake su ba.
arabic: لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجُواْ لَا يَخۡرُجُونَ مَعَهُمۡ وَلَئِن قُوتِلُواْ لَا يَنصُرُونَهُمۡ وَلَئِن نَّصَرُوهُمۡ لَيُوَلُّنَّ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
